page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE - SARAH
page.content: Today it is Wednesday 3rd July 85. I wake up at 6.30 am. I get out of bed and go and{read the bible}with the rest of my family, then I go to my room and get dressed. I go and help my mum prepare the{breakfast.}It is now about 7.30 am. I have breakfast with the rest of the family in the kitchen. After breakfast I clear the table, then I say goodbye to my dad and he goes off to work in Plymouth. I pack my bag and check all my{homework}is done. Then at 8.25 am. I leave the house and go and wait for the{school {bus.}When I arrive at{school}I go to registration, next lesson is drama, then we have a break and return to lessons. I have R.E., then it is time for dinner. After dinner I have Humanities and then there is another short break. Continued on page 20
